title: Ryse.Son.of.Rome.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Ryse.Son.of.Rome.Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Release info:  

Release year : 2014
Genre : Action
Developer : Crytek
Publisher : Crytek
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language:   Rus | Eng | Multi7
Voice language:  Rus | Eng
Crack: CODEX





System requirements:  
Operating system : Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 (x64 only)
Processor : Dual core with HyperThreading Technology or Quad core CPU (4+ Logical Processors)
Memory : 4 GB
Video card : 1 GB, compatible with DirectX 11
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk : 25 GB


Game information:  

Fight like a soldier. Command as a general. Arise as a legend.
Ryse: Son of Rome tells the story of Marius Titus, a young Roman soldier,
who witnessed at the hands of the barbarians, killed his entire family.
After that, dreaming of revenge, he sent to the Roman army in Britain.
Quickly achieving success, Marius should become the leader and protector
of the Empire troops. But he soon discovers that his plans to avenge can
be implemented much closer to home ...

You will be able, as never before, enjoy the journey to the heart of the Roman
Empire and brutality of battle as the PC version of Ryse: Son of Rome comes
with support for resolutions of 4K. As the next big creation of Crytek,
Ryse uses the maximum power of the PC equipment, pulling players in the
bloody drama of ancient Rome. Ã‚Â«Ryse: Son of RomeÃ‚Â» is an exciting action
game about the struggle, violence and heroism. The plot is the story of
a fearless Roman soldier named Marius Titus, who joins the army to avenge
the death of his family, and becomes a hero who fights for the salvation
of the Roman Empire.

Ryse: Son of Rome is a breathtakingly detailed cinematic recreation of
the Roman Empire, its people, wars and landscapes, as well as in detail
reproduces cruelty and power of the Roman battle.



RePack Features:  

Ryse: Son of Rome
Includes Update 2
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
Distribution has been updated.
Fixed a shortcut on the desktop.
Crack replaced by CODEX
(working solo mode arena)
